content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I cannot trust my husband since he keeps come back late at night.
So you feel as though you have lost trust with your husband, and this has made it difficult to trust him?

It seems as though you are struggling to find the right balance between thinking and self - care, especially when there are a lot of problems going on. Have you tried speaking to your husband about these issues?

situation: A lack of trust with husband.
